definition: place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: If a guy is a virgin can he get me pregnant?
sentences.chinese: 如果一個男孩兒是處男，他會讓我懷孕嗎？

sentences.english: I was a virgin when we met, and he was my first.
sentences.chinese: 我們相遇的時候我還是處男，他是我的第一個。

sentences.english: A controversial entry on the list of best sex documentaries, this one tells the story of a male virgin who embarks on a journey of sex.
sentences.chinese: 這是關於一個處男如何破處的故事。

sentences.english: Longteng cloud last consciousness is I was a virgin!
sentences.chinese: 龍騰雲的最後一個意識是我還是處男啦。
她懷孕了，哥我還是個處男。

sentences.english: In fact, today, a substantial proportion of surrogate partners' clients are older virgin men.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，今天大部分代理伴侶的客戶都是老處男。

sentences.english: If she didn't know you were a virgin, OPA, tell her.
sentences.chinese: 如果她當時不知道你是個處男，OPA，告訴她。
